column4: Is there anyone that i can talk to in private, just to help get rid of confusion through the chat room, that might be able to help me with my dapper drake installation involving a dual core processor
Is the issue that it only sees one cpu?

no, i fixed that :) my problem is that it is not clocking down... its like at a constant 1.83ghz and my laptops getting extremely hot! it doesnt overheat its just that there has to be a way to get it to clock down like in windows, right?
Ah, that I can't answer.  Sorry!
